name: SWING TRADE
description: These tools are deisgned for swing-trades.  We prefer to trend-trade and this application is good for finding new trends.  There are other tools like volume spread analysis, double top, overnight gap and others.

name: INTRADAY TRADE
description: This one searches the 15-minute bars to detect a certain pattern.  It flags stocks that are near support-resistance, ABC pattern, Pivot Point and VSA.  There are too much noise in smaller time frames.

name: NEWS PROFILE
description: The market may be random, but there is a certain predictability in how investors react to news.  We have created a news reaction tool that demonstrates how the market has reacted to a news.
